name: Simmer for 1 hour
ingredients: ½ Cup Fine dry bread crumbs
1 ½ LBS. Ground Beef (Or a mixture of Veal, Pork & Beef)
instructions: Combine eggs and milk, stir in bread crumbs, onion, parsley, salt, sage and pepper.
Put into a ring mold and then unmold in a shallow baking pan or loaf pan.
Bake at 350 for 50 Minutes for ring
Or into a loaf pan and bake for 1 hour 25 minutes
Combine ketchup, sugar, mustard spread over meat.
Return to oven for 10 more minutes.
